kinda revolutionary when it released I guess...
It sort of has an amazing story packed into an hours worth of creative puzzles...
Now that I think of it...
kinda sucks dick, 1/10
hem tek hem de arkadaÅŸla oynamaya deÄŸer

I have a feeling most people here already know what Portal is, so I'm not sure what I can say that hasn't already been said before. I personally came to this game after playing Portal 2, so although I played things a little backwards, I still enjoyed the game.
Fun and difficult puzzles with a creative way to play; forcing you to think outside the box quite a bit. Humor is dry and sadistic, which is right up my alley; but I understand that it isn't for everyone. Both game-play and story make this a must-have for anyone who likes a good challenge topped with good o' dark humor.
I personally preferred Portal 2 over this one, but many people seem to disagree. Long story short, they are both great games worth checking out, 100%!
I'm so deep in the Portal fandom at this point, I would say "save yourself", but honestly, you should join us~
Bom de mais, melhor que esse so 2 desses.
Absolute classic. Portal 2 is better but this is still amazing.
the cake was not a lie...sort of

I liked the short nature of it. The puzzles are challenging without being super difficult. I actually completed one or two by randomly opening portals hahaha. 
In the endgame, though, I did not like that I had to look around a lot to find the path forward. But in hindsight it was not too bad. 
The slight horror aspect of the game was interesting as well.
I have had this game for years finally started and finished it just now.
I recommend this game.
